Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ammo
    Abstract class to represent ammo items in the world.
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    BraceletOfKyo
    Bracelet of Kyo item that increases the health of the wearer.
    ChantAction  
    CompoundMap  
    CraftingAction
    Crafting action for players to craft an item into a superior item.
    Crop
    A Ground subclass that can be harvested when ripe into a Food item.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    EatAction  
    Farmer
    A Human subclass that act as Farmers.
    FarmerBehaviour
    A class that generates a HarvestAction if there is a ripe Crop next to the Farmer, generates a SowAction is there a is a patch of Dirt next to the Farmer or generates a FertilizeAction is the Farmer is standing on an unripe crop.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertilizeAction
    An action for a Farmer to fertilize a Crop so that the Crop ripens faster.
    Floor  
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    An Item subclass that can be consumed by the Player to regain HP.
    GunItem
    Abstract class to represent different forms of guns in the world.
    HarvestAction
    A harvesting action for the Player and Farmers to harvest a ripe Crop into a Food item
    HorizontalWall
    A class that represents a horizontal wall.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    MamboMarie  
    NewWorld  
    Path
    A class that represents dirt that has been pathed.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    QuitGameAction  
    Shotgun
    Class representing a Shotgun item.
    ShotgunAction
    Action class that is used as a menu option to use the Shotgun.
    ShotgunAmmo
    Class representing the ammo item for Shotguns.
    ShotgunAttackAction
    Class to deal damage to an Actor in the range of a Shotgun blast.
    ShotgunShootAction
    Action class that uses the direction given to shoot the Shotgun.
    SniperAction
    Action class that is used as a menu option to use the Sniper Rifle.
    SniperAimAction
    Action class that spends a turn aiming at the target given.
    SniperAmmo
    Class representing the ammo item for SniperRifles.
    SniperRifle
    Class representing a SniperRifle item.
    SniperShootAction
    Action class that shoots the given target based on the number of aims the Player has.
    SolidTerrain
    An abstract class that represents Ground instances that cannot be passed by Actors.
    SowAction
    An action to plant a Crop at a specified location.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    Vehicle
    A class that represents a vehicle item.
    VerticalWall
    A class that represents a vertical wall.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieArm
    Weapon dropped from knocking off the arm of a Zombie.
    ZombieAttackAction
    Attack action for Zombies to choose between a normal attack or a bite attack.
    ZombieAttackBehaviour
    A class that generates a ZombieAttackAction if there is an attackable Actor standing beside it.
    ZombieClub
    Weapon obtained by crafting a Zombie Arm.
    ZombieCorpse
    An Item subclass which represents a corpse Item when an Actor is killed by a Zombie.
    ZombieLeg
    Weapon dropped from knocking off the leg of a Zombie.
    ZombieMace
    Weapon obtained by crafting a Zombie Leg
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
